name: Goblin Land Mine
tooltip:
Goblin Land Mine
Item Level 39
Requires Engineering (195)
Use: Places the Goblin Land Mine on the ground.  It will explode for 394 to 506 fire damage the next time a hostile creature passes near it.  The mine has a duration of 1 min. (1 Min Cooldown)
Max Stack: 10
Sell Price: 16
